data.title: Gauri Pradhan Tejwani: Movies, TV, and Bio
data.meta_description: Browse Gauri Pradhan Tejwani movies and TV shows available on Prime Video and begin streaming right away to your favorite device.
data.text:
Gauri Pradhan Tejwani, a distinguished Indian television actress and former model, has left an indelible mark on the entertainment industry. Born into a family of three siblings, her formative years were marked by the nomadic lifestyle imposed by her father's service in the Indian Army. Despite the challenges, Gauri's early education thrived under the care of her homemaker mother and her father, a retired army personnel.

The spotlight found Gauri with her portrayal of Nandini Virani in the iconic Indian soap opera "Kyunki Saas Bhi Kabhi Bahu Thi." This breakthrough role not only garnered immense popularity but also established her as a household name. Gauri's on-screen chemistry and compelling performances resonated with television audiences, carving a niche for her in the hearts of fans.

Beyond "Kyunki Saas Bhi Kabhi Bahu Thi," Gauri Pradhan Tejwani continued to enchant viewers with her versatile acting in prominent television series like "Kutumb," "Meri Aashiqui Tum Se Hi," and "Pyaar Kii Ye Ek Kahaani." Her ability to seamlessly portray diverse characters showcased her as a powerhouse performer within the Indian television landscape.

The actress ventured into reality TV, notably participating in "Nach Baliye" alongside her husband, the esteemed actor Hiten Tejwani. This further endeared her to a broader audience, showcasing not just her talent but also her endearing personality.

Gauri Pradhan Tejwani's personal and professional life intertwined, primarily through her relationship with Hiten Tejwani. The couple's love story, born on the sets of television projects, blossomed into a marriage that has been an inspiration to their fans. Considered one of the most beloved couples in the Indian television industry, Gauri and Hiten share a beautiful family. Blessed with twins, Katya and Nevaan, their commitment to both successful careers and a fulfilling family life remains a testament to their enduring bond.
